Text:
If u want a modified version see this side:

http://nightly.openttd.org/win32/

only need copy the sampe.cat, trg1r.grf, trgcr.grf, trghr.grf, trgir.grf, trgtr.grf to the data directory from this uploaded version, and u have a "brand new" Transport Tycoon Deluxe.
